## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## user-specific files

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Others
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.tmp
*.bak
*.cache

# Rider
.idea/

# VS Code
.vscode/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Publish
publish/
